name.ja: <ruby>獄<rt>ごく</rt></ruby><ruby>神<rt>しん</rt></ruby><ruby>影<rt>えい</rt></ruby><ruby>機<rt>き</rt></ruby>－ゼグレド

text.en:
(This card is always treated as a "DoomZ" card.)
You can banish (face-down) the top 3 cards of your Deck; destroy this card, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Jupiter the Power Patron of Destruction" from your Extra Deck (this is treated as an Xyz Summon), then you can attach 1 card from your hand to it. If this card is added to your Extra Deck face-up: You can add 1 "Power Patron" or "DoomZ" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Power Patron Shadow Machine Zegredo" once per turn.

pendulum_effect.en: During your Main Phase: You can destroy both this card and 1 "Power Patron" or "DoomZ" monster in your hand or face-up field, then you can destroy 1 card on the field. You can only use this effect of "Power Patron Shadow Machine Zegredo" once per turn.
